data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CbPCxz6zWCMQ7kNvgH1Whmt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBhGv8MH6M15rshu7Lc6F0rGtOfXl4eM48oWWEqGYoujg&oe=666FF9CC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JwO2pzghps8Q7kNvgFFXqLI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCRv3UtjQS-IV4e20zfbIbViG3deiIM8Tyx6SVksJgp4Q&oe=6670301F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=HTcyIeFKcxgQ7kNvgHHf1_b&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCQYuSm82Pg-SXuYw2ejExOVQT4YVw-0yhfMe5hVRrJ0g&oe=66701571)
